header.title: Missafir Referral Program
header.description: Our program lets you earn passive income by referring homeowners to us.

Card.title: Recommend us to a homeowner
Card.description: Let them discover professional property management and short-term rentals.

Card.title: Earn 10%* of our commission revenue
Card.description: It's a win-win â€” you benefit, as do your homeowner friends, adding value to their property.

timeline.description: Joining the Missafir referral program is simple. Here are the steps:
timeline.title: How Does the Referral Program Work?

attributes.title: Contact
attributes.description: Submit your details, and we'll call you.

attributes.title: Approval
attributes.description: Upon your confirmation, we contact the referred homeowner.

attributes.title: Presentation
attributes.description: We present our professional property management system to them.

attributes.title: Agreement
attributes.description: After finalizing the agreement, the commission phase starts.

attributes.title: Payment
attributes.description: Maintain the agreement, and earn 10% of our monthly commission!

infoContents.title: Terms & Conditions
infoContents.description:
- *Referral payments amount to 10% of Missafir's commission revenue, which is 3% of the total income.
- Referral payments commence after the homeowner you recommended signs an agreement with Missafir. 
- If the homeowner does not renew the contract, your referral payments will cease. 
- MSFR Technology and Consultancy Inc. reserves the right to make changes in the referral campaign. 
- The contract terms are outlined on the [Missafir User Agreement page](https://www.missafir.com/en/terms/).

bannerHeader.title: Rent your property short-term with Missafir and maximize your income

bannerBody.description: Tap into our professional property management system and increase your home rental earnings. Contact us today.
